'''Kamen''' is an event-exclusive NPC that appears in the [[Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival]] event.

==Profile==
<!-- Detailed story/lore information goes here. -->

===Appearance===
Kamen takes the form of an old woman with brown hair tied in a bun. She wears a red fox mask, sandals with tabi, and a dark ankle-length dress.

==Event Dialogue==
===Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival===
====Dialogue Set #1====
''Available between completing [[As Though Caught in a Dream]] and [[As Though Beholding Illusions]]''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Kamen:''' Ah, me... I only came down for a little jaunt because they said humans and youkai were holding a festival together. But it seems there are fewer guests than I imagined... Ah, me, oh dear.
{{Dialogue End}}

====Dialogue Set #2====
''Available after completing [[As Though Beholding Illusions]]''
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Kamen:''' With the nightmares banished, the [[Mikawa Flower Festival]] should be all a-bustle again! Speaking of which, I should go grab myself a prayer slip...
{{Dialogue End}}
